an6.111:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnam dhammanam pahanaya tayo dhamma bhavetabba.
an6.111:1.7: Kamadhatuya pahanaya nekkhammadhatu bhavetabba, byapadadhatuya pahanaya abyapadadhatu bhavetabba, vihimsadhatuya pahanaya avihimsadhatu bhavetabba.
an6.111:1.8: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnam dhammanam pahanaya ime tayo dhamma bhavetabba”ti.
